edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute.graph

Class BaseDataflowTaskGraph<TV,TE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute.graph.BaseDataflowTaskGraph<TV,TE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITaskGraph<TV,TE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputeGraph

    public abstract class BaseDataflowTaskGraph<TV,TE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITaskGraph<TV,TE>
    It is the base class for the dataflow task graph which implements the IDataflowTaskGraph interface. This is the main interface for the directed dataflow task graph which consists of methods to add the task vertices, task edges, create the directed edges, finds out the inward and outward task edges, incoming and outgoing task edges.
